data.name: je_fps
data.marketing: Jomres Frontpage Slideshow plugin can be used to display your featured listings in a nice layout on your site frontpage. It has support for specifying the property types you need to display and the number of featured listings to display, making it very useful if you have a portal with more property/listing types. It requires the jomres_asamodule and featured_listings plugins to be installed.
data.description: Jomres Frontpage Slideshow plugin can be used to display your featured listings in a nice layout on your site frontpage. It has support for specifying the property types you need to display and the number of featured listings to display, making it very useful if you have a portal with more property/listing types. It requires the jomres_asamodule and featured_listings plugins to be installed. Set the jomres_asamodule task to je_fps and set the params to &ptype_id=X,Y,Z (or 0 if you want to display all property types) and &limit=L (to limit the number of displayed properties)
data.change_log: v3.1 Updated paths and usage of Markdown. v3.2 Node/javascript path related changes. v3.3 French language file added v BS4 template set added v3.5 Language files updated v3.6 Bootstrap 5 template set added.
data.author: Vince Wooll
